ABOUT Bast foot forward


Bast Foot Forward


Everyone likes content that’s easy to read, and English is the most common language in the U.S. The most recent U.S. census shows there are parts of the country where 95% of your potential customers speak only English. Nationwide, that number is 79.9%.
Attention spans are short in our headline society. You want your content to stand out, convert browsers to buyers, and save customers time. Our ESL Communication Package will help you uncover hidden weaknesses, take advantage of your strengths, and establish a plan for audience engagement that builds customer loyalty and trust.

Best Foot Forward Customer Responses
Before-and-after surveys give a clear picture of how fluent native content impacts customer satisfaction and your bottom line. That is part of best practices in market research and how we ensure you’re getting the best help we can give.
